item.title: EKC 25 CHRISTMAS EDITION HAS BEEN RELEASED BUT I AM NOT PUSHING A PROMPT UNTIL LATER IN THE AFTERNOON. IF YOU WANT IT NOW JUST CLICK UPDATE UNDER EKC. BLACK FRIDAY SALE WILL BEGIN SOON. I WILL BE DROPPING THE PRICES OF SELECT EKC DEVICES BY $15 TONIGHT. IF YOU WANT TO PICK UP LOCALLY I WILL REFUND THE SHIPPING AMOUNT UPON PICKUP. BLACK FRIDAY SALE IS FOR SALES VIA OUR WEBSITE ONLY.
DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM
SIGN UP FOR GEARS TV FOR A PREMIUM SETUP. SIGN UP AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM/GEARSTV THIS SERVICE IS AMAZING. GREAT GUIDE AS WELL.
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT. HAPPY STREAMING
IF YOU NEED ANY SUPPORT YOU CAN EMAIL ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM OR MESSAGE US ON OUR FACEBOOK PAGE FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG
